overview:
Declan O’Mahoney is a member of the board of directors of the 1394 Trade Association and was founder and first chairman of the RBWG (Residential Backbone Working Group) of the 1394TA.

Throughout his career, Declan has held executive positions in sales and marketing in major multinational companies within the electronics industry. Prior to joining Firecomms, Declan spent five years in Santa Clara, California as president of Northstar Systems Corporation where he piloted a worldwide sales and engineering team to fast growth in the computer and IT market segments. As a founding member of Northstar, he played a key role in the companyâ€™s substantial growth to over US$60M in sales, manufacturing facilities in Asia and over 2000 employees worldwide.
